HOME.SUBTITLE: Software creator who speaks human language.

ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.BIO1: I am a computer science student with a passion for programming and creating elegant solutions. In my projects, I focus on clean code and efficient architecture because I believe quality software should not only be functional but also understandable and maintainable.
ABOUT.BIO2: I am constantly learning new technologies and concepts that help me improve my programming skills. My philosophy is that good code isn't just about correct functionality, but also about readability and easy extensibility. I prefer elegant and clear solutions over unnecessarily complex ones - sometimes less is more.
ABOUT.ES_DESCRIPTION: Working on internal company projects (fullstack). Part-time job during studies.
ABOUT.BC_SCHOOL: Faculty of Applied Sciences, University of West Bohemia
ABOUT.SPSCV_TITLE: High School Diploma - Automation in Engineering
ABOUT.SPSCV_SCHOOL: Secondary Technical School and Higher Vocational School Chomutov
ABOUT.PERSONAL_DESCRIPTION: I come from the Ústí Region and in my free time I go to the gym, hang out with friends in the city, take trips or watch hockey.
ABOUT.CONTACT_PROMPT: Do you have an interesting project and are looking for a motivated computer science student?

TECH.TITLE: Technologies
TECH.DESCRIPTION: Here is a list of technologies I have worked with. Most of them are part of my projects that you can find in the Projects section.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Do you have a question or an interesting project? Don't hesitate to contact me.
CONTACT.NAME_TOO_SHORT: Name must be at least 2 characters long
CONTACT.SUBJ_TOO_SHORT: Subject must be at least 2 characters long
CONTACT.MESSAGE_TOO_SHORT: Message must be at least 10 characters long
CONTACT.SEND_SUCCESS: Message has been successfully sent. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
CONTACT.SEND_ERROR: An error occurred while sending the message. Please try again later.
CONTACT.FORM_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION: I apologize, I'm currently working on the contact form. It will be available soon.
CONTACT.USE_EMAIL: In the meantime, please contact me directly via the email address above.
